line.comment: * Search visible and valid hostile contacts dependent on attack preference
* Return wing home, once no enemy is available for attack
* If autocarrier is active, and a docking delay is set, or this is a bomber wing, or there are still targets fed up with missiles, do not dock ships

line.text: '%sTarget not found. Leader distance from THIS: %s Range: %s'

line.comment: * Return wing home, once no enemy is available for attack
* Start wing attack on all wing ships (or move wing on all wing ships in case this is a bomber wing), if they are not already attacking / moving to this target
* Target survey: wait here as long as the target is still valid
* If the target is 'fed up' with missiles, start a timer on the target, which will reset it's strenth after a short period, if the target survives missile attack
* Calculate wing's attack strength (bomber wings are counted 3 times more effective than normal wings)
* Subtract wing attack strength from strength target is currently attacked with
* Get max attack strength target ought to be attacked
* Raise max attack strength enemy ship ought to be attacked, if this is a bomber wing (just in case enemy ship is already fed up with normal wings)
* If target is now attacked with less than max force, end 5 minutes counter

line.text: '%sTHIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN, control for wing %s should not be left at this point 1.'

sval.val: %sTarget not found. Leader distance from THIS: %s Range: %s
%sTHIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN, control for wing %s should not be left at this point 1.
Search visible and valid hostile contacts dependent on attack preference
Return wing home, once no enemy is available for attack
If autocarrier is active, and a docking delay is set, or this is a bomber wing, or there are still targets fed up with missiles, do not dock ships
Return wing home, once no enemy is available for attack
Start wing attack on all wing ships (or move wing on all wing ships in case this is a bomber wing), if they are not already attacking / moving to this target
Target survey: wait here as long as the target is still valid
If the target is 'fed up' with missiles, start a timer on the target, which will reset it's strenth after a short period, if the target survives missile attack
Calculate wing's attack strength (bomber wings are counted 3 times more effective than normal wings)
Subtract wing attack strength from strength target is currently attacked with
Get max attack strength target ought to be attacked
Raise max attack strength enemy ship ought to be attacked, if this is a bomber wing (just in case enemy ship is already fed up with normal wings)
If target is now attacked with less than max force, end 5 minutes counter
